text: Erling Martin Jonny Nilsson (9 February 1943 â€“ 22 June 2022) was a Swedish competitive speed skater. He won a gold medal at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Nilsson died on 22 June 2022 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Sweden Category:Sportspeople from Gothenburg
title: Jonny Nilsson
